p: The use of woody plant medium (WPM) with different concentrations and types of auxins showed that dicamba was not the best auxin to induce calluses from all P. bullata explants ( Table 2). The negative response was also observed for WPMO medium where no callus was produced from all explants and both conditions. However, when compared with MS, the midrib cultured on WPM + 16.56 µM picloram in dark produced the highest callus at 53.33 ± 22.06% after 78 days of culture.
